description:
Since Haru told Ren to stay away from Natsuo, though on the surface their life appears normal, the relationship between Haru and Ren has become awkward. Ren`s strangely obedient and quiet behavior reminds Haru of the time two years ago when he returned to Canada alone and makes him uneasy. Meanwhile, Ren says he`ll give up on Haru if he doesn`t want to do it with him...
Source: crunchyroll
